name: MaskThrower
description:
Avoid getting sneezed on, whilst throwing masks at people.

Made in 6-12 hours for GDU game jam 4.

----------------------

Fun fact: because I couldnt get the compiler to do multiple files, the images are out in the open. I tested it, and turns out this game supports skin packs. If you dont like the graphics, simply replace them with images of your choice. The name does have to match exactly.

Doesnt even have to be the same size, the code calculates the hitbox from the image dimensions.
